ðŸ“– Summary: FlareSolverr is a proxy server designed to bypass Cloudflare and DDoS-GUARD protection. It utilizes Selenium and undetected-chromedriver to solve challenges, providing HTML code and cookies that can be used to access protected resources. The project offers Docker installation, precompiled binaries, and source code installation options, catering to various user preferences and system architectures.
